events.message: We received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been categorized under the Software Engineer role based on your submitted skills and experience.
A recruiter from our engineering division has been assigned to assist you throughout the hiring process.
We completed the initial screening of your application and found your background aligns well with the software engineering role.
Thank you for promptly responding to our initial screening questions and confirming your availability for the next steps.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our senior developers to discuss your engineering skills and experience.
You successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating strong problem-solving abilities and coding proficiency.
Your HR interview has been scheduled to further discuss culture fit and employment terms with our human resources team.
You completed the HR interview, showing enthusiasm for the company values and confirming your preferred start date.
An offer for the Software Engineer role has been proposed including salary and benefits aligned with your expectations.
We received your positive feedback regarding the offer and your excitement to join the engineering team.
You have officially accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as our new Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has started, including orientation sessions and setup of development tools for your role.
The hiring process is now closed successfully, and you are officially hired as a Software Engineer in our engineering department.
